introductionText: Welcome to our website. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the information you share with us. This privacy policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and the choices available to you regarding your information.
informationWeCollectText:
• Information You Provide: Such as your name, email address, phone number, and content submitted via forms or registration.

• Automatic Information: Usage data such as visited pages, time spent, IP address, browser type, and device information.
howWeUseInformationText: We use your information to improve our services, communicate with you about your account or inquiries, and send optional notifications or marketing materials if you agree. We also use data for analytical and technical purposes to enhance website performance and user experience.
locationInformationText:
Our app may request access to your device location to provide the best possible service. This helps us personalize content, recommend services, and improve your user experience based on your location.

Your location data is never shared with third parties for marketing purposes and is only used internally to enhance app functionality. You can control location access through your device settings at any time.
informationSharingText: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share limited data with trusted service providers (such as hosting providers, analytics tools, and payment processors) under strict confidentiality agreements.
cookiesText: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect certain website features.
dataSecurityText: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access or loss. However, no system is 100% secure, so please exercise caution when sharing sensitive information.
dataRetentionText: We retain data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined above or to comply with legal obligations.
yourRightsText:
• The right to access your data and request a copy.
• The right to correct inaccurate data.
• The right to request deletion of your data under certain circumstances.
• The right to withdraw consent for data processing where consent was required.
linksToOtherSitesText: Our website may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those sites and encourage you to review their policies before sharing any personal information.
changesToPolicyText: We reserve the right to update this policy from time to time. The latest revision date will always be displayed at the top of this page.
